subject: EPUB Beautification Complete & Wave 3 Status Check
body:
I have completed the EPUB Beautification task (CSS upgrades, multi-chapter EPUB generation, API data wiring). 

I also verified the status of the ongoing IES Reader Wave 3 tasks:

- Section 3.3 (Selection Action Bar): Implemented ✅

I am ready to proceed with fixing the touch targets or awaiting new instructions.
